// Pivot 0, 0
int rightblock[14] = {
	167, 121,
	177, 121,
	177, 148,
	175, 154,
	169, 154,
	167, 148,
	167, 130
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float rightblock[14] = {
	0.452575f, 0.201667f,
	0.479675f, 0.201667f,
